quoteFirst: Fisher moved that the House should approve of them and of their application to New Brunswick. This resolution was carried by a vote of
quoteLast: , which was a complete reversal of the vote of the previous session. Among those who voted for the resolution were the three members of the government who had seats in the House of Assembly and who had been previously opposed to any such change in the political system of the country.
title: Wilmot and Tilley
author: Hannay, James, 1842-1910
